main_definition: Refers to something that relates or affects the whole world or a large, widespread area.

meanings_and_examples.definition: worldwide; universal; global in scope and reach.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company has a global presence with offices located in over 50 countries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concerning or affecting the whole world; of international importance.
meanings_and_examples.example: Global warming is an issue that affects all nations and requires collective action to address.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adapted for a global audience, often involving cultural sensitivity and broader appeal.
meanings_and_examples.example: The movie was produced with a global release in mind, featuring elements appealing to diverse cultures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or consisting of many different parts that work together as one system.
meanings_and_examples.example: A global network involves various interconnected systems and components across the world.
